name: Slime Breeder
description:
Welcome to Slime Breeder!

You are in the business of selling slimes as pets to loving homes. 
You can: 
-Click on two slimes to breed them. You can't breed baby slimes.
-Click on a slime and press 's' to sell it
-Press 'b' to buy another slime

Each slime has a unique color and pedigree. How much money can you make in the slime business?
